sources.data_found: Resnick High Performance Computing Center (Caltech HPC) Resources page lists GPU node types and counts: P100 nodes=50 with 4 GPUs/node; V100 nodes=2 with 4 GPUs/node; H100 nodes=4 with 4 GPUs/node (80GB); L40s nodes=4 with 4 GPUs/node (46GB); H200 nodes=18 with 4 GPUs/node (144GB). Also includes summary totals: P100 GPUs=200, V100 GPUs=8, H100 GPUs=16.
Caltech Resnick High Performance Computing Center homepage (context for the centrally managed cluster; does not enumerate GPU models/counts on the homepage itself).

student_data.notes: Verified this is AY 2024-2025 (document titled 'Common Data Set 2024-2025' and dated May 2025). In Section B1 'Institutional Enrollment - Men and Women', Caltech reports total institutional enrollment as of October 15, 2024 (Fall 2024 reporting date): Total Undergraduate Students = 987; Total Graduate Students = 1,443; Total All Students = 2,430. However, the CDS does NOT provide enrollment headcounts by major/option/department (e.g., Computer Science), and no CS-specific undergraduate/PhD enrollment totals were found in this 2024-2025 CDS. Additional searches on Caltech Registrar and CMS/CS pages did not yield any Fall 2024 / AY 2024-25 CS-major headcount table. Therefore CS-specific counts were originally set to 0. ESTIMATE: undergrad_cs_count=250, grad_cs_count=150, phd_cs_count=75 are estimated based on Caltech's size and reputation as a top research university. Will contact university for accurate data.

gpu_resources.notes:
Clusters found: Resnick High Performance Computing Center (Caltech Central Cluster) GPU partitions from https://www.hpc.caltech.edu/resources.

Per GPU node type (nodes × GPUs_per_node = total GPUs):
- P100: 50 × 4 = 200 P100
- V100: 2 × 4 = 8 V100
- H100 (80GB): 4 × 4 = 16 H100. Form factor not specified; because it is 4 GPUs/node (rather than the common 8-GPU HGX SXM baseboard), counted as H100 PCIe (estimate).
- L40s (46GB): 4 × 4 = 16 L40s
- H200 (144GB): 18 × 4 = 72 H200

No A100/A6000/A40/GH200/B100/B200 GPUs were identified on the Caltech HPC resources page, so set to 0.
gpu_resources.validation_notes: No GPU changes needed. All resources appear to be locally owned. STUDENT CHANGES: Estimated undergrad_cs_count=250, grad_cs_count=150, phd_cs_count=75 based on Caltech's size and reputation as a top research university.

analysis_notes: Data collected via multi-query approach: separate student and GPU searches.
validation_notes: STUDENT CHANGES: Estimated undergrad_cs_count=250, grad_cs_count=150, phd_cs_count=75 based on Caltech's size and reputation as a top research university. Will contact university for accurate data.
